attributes.action: Oldham needs places for familys to have fun
attributes.additional_details:
Do you live in Oldham? Have you visited Oldham resently?

Its a mess, theirs nowhere for anybody to go in Oldham, no Cinema, Bowling Alleys, Ice rinks or anything anymore.

Why dont the gorvernment, stop spending our money stupidly on things we dont need, such as the Afghan war, third-world countrys, and give our own country something what we are lacking.
If their was places for famiyls to go in Oldham this could create thousands of jobs in the Borough, Oldham never get anything just a metrolink and a spindles shopping centre thats half way to shutting down.

Please sign this petition and let our voice be heard by the government and let them know we want action.

Make Oldham a better place for everyone Thank you.
